jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist (Turkey)
jobListings.description:
Who Are We?

Hiwell is the largest online therapy platform in Turkey, founded to help clients get to know themselves better, feel better, and develop a more positive outlook on life, preferred by over 350,000 clients with a pool of 1,000 psychologists. Through our website and mobile application, we aim to establish the healthiest communication between clients and expert psychologists.

How Do We Work?

Thanks to our mobile application, our clients can receive services from our expert psychologists more quickly and practically. We work with psychologists who are experts in their fields to provide the best service to our clients. Our top priority is that our team of expert psychologists consists of psychologists who have completed their master's degrees in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy, have taken or are taking supervision, and prioritize ethical work.

Hiwell offers a completely online working opportunity. Therefore, you can work from any city at any time.

● Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate program,
● Holding a master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy,
● Proficient in therapy applications,
● Experienced in client follow-up,
● Knowledgeable about methods and technologies related to their field,
● Has taken or is currently taking supervision,
● Values ethical principles

If you meet the above qualifications, we eagerly await your application!

jobListings.companyName: Psikolaj Psychological Development, Education, and Counseling Center
jobListings.title: Expert Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for new team members for our psychological counseling center, located in Bahçeşehir and providing services with an expert team for 10 years.
- Completed a master's/doctoral degree in Clinical Psychology,
- Preferably received Family Counseling training,
- Actively practicing EMDR therapy and play therapy (for child and adolescent therapists),
- Experienced in at least two therapy schools,
- Following scientific developments in the field,
- Proficient in therapy and test applications,
- Has at least 5 years of psychotherapy experience,
- Fluent in English,
- Strong communication skills, compatible with teamwork,
- Willing to develop projects and conduct research,
- No transportation issues to Bahçeşehir region
4 expert psychologists are needed in the fields of 'Child and Adolescent' and 'Adult - Family Therapy' on a full-time or part-time basis.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Who Are We?

The 1001Terapist Platform brings together Mental Health Professionals working in Psychology, Psychiatry, and Psychological Counseling with those seeking psychological support. The 1001Terapist Platform lists therapists who have been positively evaluated and have subscribed to the service package online. Clients can request online or face-to-face appointments with the most suitable therapist through appropriate filters.

We keep ourselves updated with every digital innovation to facilitate clients' faster and more practical access to therapists registered on 1001Terapist.com. We push the limits to maximize your visibility in search engines and ensure that clients have a quality time on the website. Our top priority is that therapists registered on our platform are ethical and experts in their fields.

Criteria to be considered in 1001Terapist Platform Applications:

● Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate program,
● Proficient in therapy applications,
● Experienced in client follow-up,
● Knowledgeable about methods and new developments related to their field,
● Has taken or is currently taking supervision,
● Values ethical principles

jobListings.title: Psychologist

jobListings.companyName: Diyethall Nutrition and Diet Counseling Center
jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a shared office psychologist for our center located in Kadıköy/Kozyatağı as Diyethall Nutrition and Diet Counseling Center. The office room will be delivered furnished and set up. Office expenses, dues, bills, etc. are included in the room rent. There will be no additional fee other than the fixed monthly payment.

In our office, there are two separate dietitian rooms in addition to the psychologist's room, and active client consultations are held.

Individuals who work within ethical rules and have or potentially have their own client portfolio can apply to our announcement.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
A Clinical Psychologist will be hired to work full-time with semi-independent working hours as the owner of their own business within myPsikolog International Clinic.

Average Monthly Salary Paid by the Institution: 43,200 TL

Average Monthly Net Salary Received by the Psychologist: 36,000.00 TL

Job Owner: myPsikolog International Clinic

Clinic's Area of Impact: Throughout Turkey and Europe

Job Type: Online

Job Location: Home/Home Office

Business Model: Franchising

Hiring Method: Interview

Psychology Degree: Mandatory

Clinical Psychology Master's Degree: Mandatory

After the Psychologist's Acceptance;

Orientation Training: Available

Orientation/Training Duration: 5 Days

Orientation/Training Location: Kayseri

Is Training Mandatory: Yes

Number of Sessions Conducted in One Day: 6-8

Is the Job Full-Time: Yes

Is the Psychologist the Owner of Their Own Business: Yes

Can the Psychologist Determine Their Working Hours: Yes

Commission: Available

Birthday Leave: Available

Conditions:

- Our partner psychologist cannot work in any job outside this job (academic activities are excluded.)

- The psychologist cannot accept clients from outside the institution's clients.

- The psychologist cannot have a professional presence on the internet.

- The psychologist who succeeds in the interviews must come to Kayseri for a 5-day orientation process.

Psychologists' Thoughts on This Job:

Psychologist Video-1:

https://vimeo.com/867177985?share=copy

Psychologist Video-2:

https://vimeo.com/854963015?share=copy

Psychologist Video-3:

https://vimeo.com/854961957?share=copy

Psychologist Video-4:

https://vimeo.com/860952614?share=copy

Psychologist Video-5:

https://vimeo.com/854961755?share=copy

Job Location and Accommodation in Kayseri:

Our clinic is located in the center of Kayseri. During the 5-day orientation process, you will reside in Kayseri. During this time, we get to know the person who will carry our brand and complete various internal training. While our psychologists' accommodation preferences are their own responsibility, we do assist.

Clinic Website:

www.mypsikolog.com

Clinic Instagram Account:

www.instagram.com/mypsikologofficial

Clinic Management Center Address:

Office Kayseri Plaza - A Block Floor: 13 No: 50

Kocasinan/Kayseri

jobListings.title: Psychologist

- Experienced in psychotherapy in the field, completed a master's degree or doctorate in Clinical Psychology
- Our office rooms are suitable for psychologists for hourly, daily, and monthly use.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
As Sense Special Education Kocaeli, we are looking for a Clinical Psychologist with the following qualifications to join our team:

Duties and Responsibilities:

Conducting play therapy processes
Conducting family meetings
Being an implementer of Denver, AGTE, and other child assessment tests and evaluations
Playing an active role in teamwork

Qualifications:

Holding a bachelor's or master's degree in Clinical Psychology
Experienced in play therapy
Competent in conducting family meetings
Possessing good communication skills
Inclined to work in a team

Sense Special Education Kocaeli invites our valued colleagues to join our dynamic team!

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for candidates to be employed at our Special Education and Rehabilitation Center in Körfez District, Kocaeli;

- Residing in Kocaeli,
- Graduated from the Psychology department of universities,
- Possessing organization and planning skills,
- Capable of reporting and presenting,
- Completed military service for male candidates,
- Trained and certified in child development psychology,
- Capable of administering Standford Binet, Denver, Wisc-R, Wisc 4 tests to students,

We are waiting for applications from relevant candidates.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist (Shared Office)
jobListings.description:
As Ethica Psychology, we open our office located in Kadıköy/Caddebostan for shared office use for our colleagues who provide psychotherapy services in the fields of children, adolescents, adults, and couples.

It is also suitable for daily/monthly/periodic rentals.

In our office, there is a play therapy room and two separate rooms for individual sessions.

Our colleagues who work within ethical rules and have their own client portfolio

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
I have opened one of the rooms in my office, located opposite the Alsancak State Hospital in Izmir, for use by my psychologist and psychological counselor colleagues.
The room is suitable for individual sessions and is available for hourly and daily use. A fixed fee is charged. There is no assistant service. Tea/coffee is available in the waiting area.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Subject: Looking for a therapist to collaborate on client referrals

I am looking for a therapist suitable to work face-to-face or online with referred clients in my consulting office located in Bursa- Osmangazi.

I would like to meet colleagues who have a similar working model or are open to development in this direction, need a space to see their own clients, and meet the following criteria.

- Candidates must have a master's degree in Clinical Psychology,
- At least 2 years of active work experience,
- Preferably has their own individual psychotherapy experience,
- Prioritizes ethical work values.

jobListings.title: Psychologist

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
For our clinic located in the Yıldırım region of Bursa,

- Completed a master's degree in Clinical Psychology after a psychology degree,
- Received training in the school they specialize in,
- Continuing to receive supervision,
- Preferably started their own therapy process,
- Has their own client portfolio
We are looking for colleagues with whom we can share an office and produce together, who can agree on ethical and human values.

We work in a way where a certain number of specialists work regularly in our clinic, and hourly rentals from outside are not possible.

jobListings.title: Psychologist / Psychological Counselor
jobListings.description:
You can take your sessions at Matiat Psikoakademi Ankara, located on Bestekar Street. For detailed information, you can reach us at 05011490202.

Our office is very close to Tunalı Hilmi. There are training rooms, individual and couple consultation rooms. In our shared office, there is a fixed hourly payment system; it is not based on a percentage of room sharing.

Offered Facilities:
- Client greeting/Secretarial service
- Room sharing
- Follow-up of client appointments
- Participation in the training and workshop team
- Promotion on social media
